mp.example.Department.name: Department
mp.example.Department.sqlCreate: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Department ( id INTEGER primary key,PRIEZVISKO VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,MENO VARCHAR(100),department INTEGER,name VARCHAR(255),code VARCHAR(255),FOREIGN KEY (department) REFERENCES department(id))
mp.example.Department.sqlReference: ALTER TABLE OSOBA ADD FOREIGN KEY (department) REFERENCES department(id);ALTER TABLE Department ADD FOREIGN KEY (department) REFERENCES department(id)
